headline: The Nasdaq Just Hit Correction Territory: Is It Time to Buy Dividend Stocks?
summary: The Nasdaq Composite (NASDAQINDEX: ^IXIC) has fallen more than 10% from a recent high.  A bear market -- a 20% drop from recent highs -- is not guaranteed to happen, but this is why investors get so worried about a 10% market decline.
